alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 2:01AM EDT until August 24 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Logan County in west central Ohio... Hardin County in west central Ohio... Northern Union County in central Ohio... * Until 245 AM EDT. * At 201 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Upper Sandusky, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Kenton, Ada, Richwood, Forest, Dunkirk, Alger, Belle Center, Blanchard, Mount Victory, Rushsylvania, Mcguffey, Ridgeway, Patterson, Dola, Huntersville, Pfeiffer, Big Springs, Essex, Grant, and Silver Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
